ctu_text: Of this 2 (two) are Urban projects, one is rural project and the rest are Tribal projects. All the 6(six) services under ICDS such as Supplementary nutrition, Health check up, Non formal pre-school education, Immunization, Nutrition &amp; Health education and Referral services are being provided through a Network of 3980 Anganwadi centres in the State. \nPresently 60 (sixty) ICDS projects are operating in the state covering 3. 45 Lakh beneficiaries under 3980 Anganwadi centres where all the 6 (six) services are provided to children in the age group of 0-6, pregnant women and lactating mothers.
